project: Zotero Name Normalizer - Progress Bar Fix
description: Fix progress bar being stuck at 3% by adding progress callbacks to findDiacriticVariantsByAuthor function

userStories.title: Add progress callbacks to findDiacriticVariantsByAuthor
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see the progress bar update during surname analysis so that I know the analysis is progressing and not frozen.
acceptanceCriteria: Progress callback is called at start (0%)
Progress callback is called periodically during analysis
Progress callback is called at end (~80%)
Works for small (<50 authors), medium (100-500), and large (1000+) libraries

userStories.title: Write unit tests for progress callback
userStories.description: As a developer, I want unit tests for the progress callback functionality so that I can verify the fix works correctly and prevent regressions.
acceptanceCriteria: Test progress callback is called during analysis
Test progress percent increases over time
Test edge cases: empty input (0 authors)
Test edge cases: small dataset (<50 authors)

userStories.title: Verify fix with existing tests
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to ensure the fix doesn't break existing functionality so that the extension continues to work correctly.
